steps.name: Given  a book with ID 500 does not exist
And  a book with ID 400 does not exist
When  I update the book with ID: 500 with New ID: 400, Title: Updated Book, Description: Book Description, Page Count: 100, Excerpt: Update, Publish Date: 2025-04-03T00:00:00
Then  the response status code should be 404
